privacy.title: PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY – VacanzaMyCost.it Updated Version 2025 – GDPR compliant (EU 2016/679) + ePrivacy Directive

1.title: Data Controller
1.text: The controller is responsible for the processing of personal data collected through the website VacanzaMyCost.it.

2_1.title: Data Voluntarily Provided by Users
2_1.list5: Data entered in the travel request (period, budget, preferences)

2_3.title: Technical Navigation Data
2_3.last: Time spent and pages visited (in anonymized form)

3.title: Purpose of Processing
3.item2: Enable communication between users and agencies
3.item3: Send operational notifications (e.g. request confirmation, alerts, reminders)
3.item4: Prevent system abuse and fraudulent activities
3.item6: Comply with legal and tax obligations
3.no_sale: Data is NOT sold, transferred or used for undeclared commercial purposes.

4.title: Legal Basis for Processing
4.text:
User consent (Art. 6.1.a GDPR)
Performance of pre-contractual measures (e.g. contact with agencies)
Legal obligations (Art. 6.1.c GDPR)
Legitimate interest in website security (Art. 6.1.f GDPR)

5.title: Processing Methods
5.text: Data is processed using IT tools in compliance with the principles of: lawfulness, fairness, transparency, data minimization, integrity and confidentiality, storage limitation. Appropriate technical and organizational measures are adopted to protect the data.

6.title: Data Retention
6.text:
Data is retained for:
Max 24 months for user requests
Period necessary to fulfill legal obligations (for agencies)
Duration of the agency subscription
Technical logs: according to security policy (30–180 days)
Upon expiry, data is deleted or anonymized.

7.title: Data Disclosure
7.text:
Data may be disclosed exclusively to:
Registered travel agencies (only in relation to user requests)
Technical suppliers: hosting, email, analytics, security
Competent authorities, only if required by law
No data is transferred to third parties for commercial purposes.

8.title: Data Subject Rights (Art. 15–22 GDPR)
8.text:
The user may at any time exercise the following rights:
access to data · rectification · erasure (“right to be forgotten”) · restriction of processing · data portability · objection · withdrawal of consent
Requests via email: privacy@vacanzamycost.it
The controller replies within 30 days.

9.title: Technical and Organizational Security Measures
9.text:
The website uses:
secure HTTPS connection · anti-intrusion systems · firewall · data transmission encryption · periodic backups · restricted database access · anti-spam and anti-bot systems · monitoring of anomalous activities

10_1.title: What are cookies
10_1.text: Cookies are small text files that improve user navigation and enable the website to function properly.

10_2.title: Types of cookies used
10_2.a_text:
They enable: authentication and login · session management · request forms and agency panels · security and abuse prevention
They do not require consent.
10_2.b_text:
Used for aggregated statistics: most visited pages · session duration · anonymous traffic
If fully anonymized → no consent required.
10_2.c_text:
Activated only if present: Google Analytics · Google Ads · Facebook Pixel · Maps or embedded content
Processing follows the respective providers’ policies.
10_2.d_text:
Used only if advertising tools are active (e.g. Remarketing).
They require explicit consent.

10_3.title: Cookie Banner
10_3.text:
On first access, the user sees a banner allowing them to:
accept all cookies · reject non-essential cookies · customize preferences
The choices remain valid for 12 months.

10_4.title: How to manage/disable cookies
10_4.text:
The user can manage cookies in browser settings:
Chrome · Safari · Edge · Firefox · Opera
Disabling technical cookies may impair some site features.

10_5.title: Changes to the Cookie Policy
10_5.text:
The controller may update this policy.
Continued use of the site implies acceptance of the changes.

11.title: Transfer of data outside the EU
11.text:
Any transfers (e.g. Google, Meta, Stripe) occur only to providers compliant with:
GDPR · Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) · EU adequacy decisions

12.title: Changes to this policy
12.text:
The controller may update this Privacy & Cookie Policy at any time.
Changes take effect upon publication.

13.title: Contact
13.text:
For information, clarifications or to exercise GDPR rights:
privacy@vacanzamycost.it

howItWorks.subtitle: In 7 simple steps you find the perfect vacation – free and with no middlemen

1.title: Publish your request
1.desc: Enter destination, dates, budget and preferences in under 2 minutes. Before publication, you receive an email to confirm your request. This prevents fake submissions and ensures reliability for agencies.

2.title: Receive up to 3 personalized offers
2.desc:
Only verified agencies can reply to your request. Each offer includes:
– photos and proposed accommodation
– included services
– total price
– agency logo and name
Maximum 3 offers, all real and customized.

3.title: Compare and choose the best offer
3.desc:
You compare offers with quality badges such as:
– Top Response
– Recommended
– Ultra-fast response
– Offer confirmed by verified user
The system may also suggest a smart discount based on real parameters.

4.title: Contact the agency directly
4.desc: When you find the right offer, you contact the agency by phone, WhatsApp, or email. VacanzaMyCost.it does not apply commissions and does not manage payments. Negotiation is direct and transparent.

5.title: Offer confirmed
5.desc:
When you choose an offer, the agency updates the status to Confirmed. The offer appears in the Accepted Offers section with:
– agency logo
– trip details
– verification badge

6.title: VacanzaMyCheck: smart security
6.desc:
Every request undergoes automatic checks:
– email verification
– realistic budget control
– anti-spam systems
– request quality scoring
– Reliable User badge for those who interact actively
If a request appears suspicious, it is verified before publication.

7.title: Completely free for users
7.desc: The service is 100% free for users. No commissions. No intermediaries. Agencies only pay an optional Premium subscription for extra services.
